item.title: Setting up Development Env in Win10 and WSL2
item.description: Flashback Long back, I was a hardcore Linux enthusiast having been brain washed by the FSF folks. I have long been out of that hate mindset where you are supposed to hate everything which is not free (FSF Free). Still I love the *nix env and it is one of the best ways a developer can be productive. I had used Mac in the past and the developer friendliness that ecosystem offers is top notch.
